T02D3482:131b-1: a'arya kha di ra ba n'i t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3482:131b-3: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3482:131b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3482:131b-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pha nyid mthar thug pa
T02D3482:131b-6: bsgoms nas t'am gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa
T02D3482:131b-7: las / autpa la'i lte bar t'am gi sa bon no //
T02D3482:131b-8: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ljang gu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3482:131b-9: mchog sbyin dang autpa la ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3482:131b-10: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can dang /
T02D3482:131b-11: ral pa gcig ma dag g-yas dang /
T02D3482:131b-12: g-yon gyi phyogs char gnas pa /
T02D3482:131b-13: gzhon nu mdzes shing rgyan dang ldan ma /
T02D3482:131b-14: seng ldeng gi nags su sna tshogs pa'i sems can
T02D3482:131b-15: gyi don byed par bsams la ye shes sems dpa'
T02D3482:131b-16: dang lhan cig tu byas te /
T02D3482:131b-17: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags bzlas la /
T02D3482:131b-18: de nyid kyi yid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D3482:131b-19: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
